meanings.definition: The quality or state of being crude or unrefined.
meanings.sent1: Her painting lacked sophistication and was full of crudenesses.
meanings.sent2: The crudenesses of his manners made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent3: Despite his best efforts, his attempt at fine dining was filled with crudenesses.
meanings.sent4: The crudenesses of the rough sketch captured the raw emotion of the artist.
meanings.sent5: The crudenesses of the wooden sculpture highlighted its natural beauty.

meanings.definition: Rude or offensive behavior or language.
meanings.sent1: The comedian's jokes crossed the line into crudenesses.
meanings.sent2: She was shocked by the crudenesses of the comments made by her coworker.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled at the crudenesses of the silly puppet show.
meanings.sent4: The crudenesses of the argument left a bitter taste in everyone's mouth.
meanings.sent5: The movie's crudenesses added an unexpected edge to the storyline.
